sentences.english: B. C. C. I. became a magnet for drug money.
sentences.chinese: 国际信贷银行像一块大磁铁，吸引贩毒的钱。

sentences.english: The iron filings were attracted by the magnet and iron to form different shapes.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁和铁能吸引铁粉，形成不同的形状。

sentences.english: The taping of the magnets was the final step.
sentences.chinese: 解决磁铁报警器是最后一步。

sentences.english: E. g. 1. All magnets behave the same whether they be large or small.
sentences.chinese: 所有磁铁无论大小，其性质都是一样的。

sentences.english: Glue these to magnets and put them on the fridge.
sentences.chinese: 把这些东西粘在磁铁上面，并放到冰箱上面。

sentences.english: They have just found a magnetite in this region.
sentences.chinese: 他们在这个地区刚刚发现一个磁铁矿。

sentences.english: When the clock hand reached and collects the magnets - the assignments are due.
sentences.chinese: 当时钟指针到达并收集了这些磁铁，就该交作业了。

sentences.english: Often the magnetic people are of Asian descent and thus not typically hirsute.
sentences.chinese: 通常磁铁人是亚洲地区的，他们都是典型的少汗毛的。

sentences.english: This paper presents a microstroke mechanism driven by electromagnets and its control circuit design.
sentences.chinese: 介绍一种电磁铁驱动的微进给机构及其控制电路设计。

sentences.english: Iron filings are affected by characteristics of this eld.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁产生了磁场，铁屑被磁场的特征所影响。

sentences.english: Now it's a magnet for thrill-seekers the world over.
sentences.chinese: 如今它就像磁铁一般吸引着世界各地的冒险者。

sentences.english: The mixture of magnetite and quartz was separated by magnetic separation.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁矿和石英的混合矿样采用磁选分离。

sentences.english: Tape magnets to the bottom of a cup, put it on the roof of your car and drive around.
sentences.chinese: 在杯底粘上一块磁铁，放到车顶上，开着车四处兜风。

sentences.english: The magnet is usually made in the shape of horseshoe so that it will be as strong as possible.
sentences.chinese: 磁铁通常是做成马蹄形的，以便使其磁性尽可能地强。

sentences.english: I believe she is a magnet to the spiritual realm.
sentences.chinese: 我相信她是一个磁铁的精神境界。

sentences.english: The influences of different moisture on the properties of Jiding magnetite concentrates pellets were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了水分对冀东磁铁精矿成球性能的影响。

definition: a magnet/same as 磁鐵|磁铁
to draw (towards)/to be drawn to/to be sucked in
(of a magnet) to attract metallic objects/(fig.) to exert a magnetic attraction (for investment, tourists etc)
mutual attraction (e.g. electrostatic)/to attract one another
